name: Magical Journey (itch)
description:
Used RPG Maker MV Ace Lite to play around with during a GameJam and this is what came out.

As an absolutely dreadful wizard, you managed to destroy the fabric of reality and crash the multiverse into your own universe. Congratulations!

Make your way through this fantasy world that gathers classical fantasy elements and elements from everywhere else and merges them together without any regard for sense or logic.

Around 20-30 minutes long.
